G

gather() - Static method in class mangan.Simulator
Sets the weights so the robots gather even more to locations where they can be collected by the imaginary ship again.
gather(int) - Method in class mangan.Visualisation
Tell simulator to gather all robots.
generateFile() - Static method in class mangan.Simulator
Generates a output file with a timestamp in its name, to save all stats of a simulation run.
generateFolder() - Static method in class mangan.Simulator
Generates a Folder with the date of execution in its name to save the results of this session executed within the constructor of a simulator
getBest(Result) - Method in class mangan.Result
Compares this result to another result and returns the better one, total collected Mangan per iteration used as indicator
getDistance() - Method in class mangan.Result
Get the total distance traveled by the robots of this run

getMovest(Result) - Method in class mangan.Result

getNeighbors(Coordinates, int) - Static method in class mangan.Simulator
Given one robot, checks which robots are within the RADIUS distance and keeps the list of coordinates neighbors, with the relative positions of those respect the robot checked, so the information is able to be sent to the robot as if it was its own radar.
getRobotCount() - Static method in class mangan.Simulator

getRobots() - Method in class mangan.Result

getRobotsLocations() - Static method in class mangan.Simulator
